extension.name: org.apache.nifi.processors.ccda.ExtractCCDAAttributes
extension.description: Extracts information from an Consolidated CDA formatted FlowFile and provides individual attributes as FlowFile attributes. The attributes are named as <Parent> <dot> <Key>. If the Parent is repeating, the naming will be <Parent> <underscore> <Parent Index> <dot> <Key>. For example, section.act_07.observation.name=Essential hypertension

property.name: skip-validation
property.description: Whether or not to validate CDA message values

relationship.name: success
relationship.description: A FlowFile is routed to this relationship if it is properly parsed as CDA and its contents extracted as attributes.

relationship.name: failure
relationship.description: A FlowFile is routed to this relationship if it cannot be parsed as CDA or its contents extracted as attributes.
